name: MusicXMLPlayer
description: An open source JavaScript engine for displaying MusicXML based on VexFlow.

scripts.build-cpp: npx emsdk install 2.0.14 && npx emsdk activate 2.0.14 && npx emsdk run emcc -s EXPORT_NAME="'TotoModule'" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_toto']"  -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["cwrap"] -O3 --bind -o SynthetiserModule.js main.cpp
